SimilarGroups.SimilarityNote: Both requirements focus on providing a dashboard for caregivers to monitor health-related data and medication adherence.
SimilarGroups.DifferenceNote: Requirement 1 emphasizes general monitoring while Requirement 2 specifies real-time health monitoring and highlights missed medications or abnormal readings.

UnifiedRequirement.Name: Comprehensive Caregiver Health Monitoring Dashboard
UnifiedRequirement.Description: The system shall provide a comprehensive caregiver dashboard that allows caregivers to monitor multiple clients' health statuses in real-time, including medication adherence and abnormal health readings, ensuring they can offer appropriate support.
